title: 380. Andy, Mike Glover & DJ CTI: Federal Court Vs. Big Tech Censorship, DeSantis Sends Plane Of Migrants To Biden's Summer Home & Executive Order 14067 - Part 2
itunes:title: 380. Andy, Mike Glover & DJ CTI: Federal Court Vs. Big Tech Censorship, DeSantis Sends Plane Of Migrants To Biden's Summer Home & Executive Order 14067 - Part 2
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ are joined in the studio by entrepreneur and former Special Forces SGM Mike Glover. They discuss the decision by the federal court to limit social media companies' power to squash opinions, Gov. DeSantis sending a plane of migrants to Biden's summer home, and Biden signing an executive order giving the government unprecedented control over the U.S. dollar.
